DOC.brief_title: A Blinded Study To Examine The Ability Of PF-610,355 To Open The Airways In Asthmatic Patients .
DOC.criteria: Reversible asthmatic patient ( > 15 % increase FEV1 follow 200ug salbutamol ) . FEV1 great equal 60 % predict Stable disease least previous 3 month Subjects require rescue medication great 2 occasion 72 hour prior screen Subjects history pulmonary disease asthma .
